name: VOLKSSTURM.
description:
RUN. SHOOT. SURVIVE.

You are a nameless Volkssturm who also happens to be trapped in the battle for berlin, what will you do? will you fight to the very end at the reichstag? or will you attempt to escape berlin to the west? all that matters is that you survive this battle.

After all, the soviets take no prisoners.

CURRENT FEATURES:

Simple health system

no UI, to make it more Hardcore.

Music

Ambience

basic enemy ai, will improve down the line

a basic test map.

PLANNED FEATURES: 

A realistic berlin

Dynamic Music

Improved enemy ai

Friendly ai

A basic crosshair.

Reichstag

This game does not condone Nazism or any kind of anti-Semitic party, this is merely a dedication to all who have fought in World War 2.
